column2: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has decided it is time for §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! to leave his office.
§REnacting this decision will cost us a lot of Prestige§!
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has decided it is time for §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! to leave his office and name someone better qualified at his post.
War is upon us and it is time to muster the Tagmas to fight the ennemis of Rome.
Begin preparation for my Imperial Coronation. As [Root.GetTitle] it is imperative for me to be crowned by the Patriarch of Constantinople in order to legitimize my divine right to rule.
Begin setting up the administration of the newly acquired land,
This character is an official in the roman administration
This character is in the first year of his term of office.
This character is in the second year of his term of office.
This character is in the third year of his term of office.
This character is in the fourth year of his term of office.
This character is in the fifth year of his term of office.
A Roman Military Government is a form of organization limited to the Empire of the Romans with a focus on military life and troops management.
A Roman Civilian Government is a form of organization limited to the Empire of the Romans with a focus on the administrative management of the Empire from tax collection to justice.
A Roman Family Government is a special government limited to Great Families of the Empire of the Romans.
Administrative Clientelism is a form a succession that favors members of a clientele or family members.
The Roman Administration manages and rules the Empire of the Romans
The Emperor is the leader of the administration of the Empire
This ruler was anointed by the Patriarch of Constantinople. \n A formal coronation ceremony is considered as an essential step in legitimizing the rule of the Emperor.
Organize Military Exercises with your Tagma troops in order to maintain their discipline and effectiveness in combat
